title: So I'm just sitting in fountain at 11 minutes, waiting on the 20 minute mark to surrender.
body:
Champion Select
Everything's going well, no one's talking comp looks great.
Last pick, picks Teemo.
I jokingly say (sort of): Come on man why'd you ruin the comp @_@
Jungler (Olaf): Kill yourself (I'm not sure if he was talking me to or Teemo, Teemo tells me in game he was referring to him)


Team Comp
Our Team                                     Their Team
{{champion:222}}                       {{champion:53}} 
{{champion:57}}                          {{champion:36}} 
{{champion:2}}                            {{champion:67}} 
{{champion:112}} (me)               {{champion:103}} 
{{champion:17}}                          {{champion:19}} 


Game starts, Olaf runs straight into the enemy jungle and gives FB, botlane followed  because he was being poked down and running towards botlane.
After Olaf dies, so does Maoki and Jinx giving Vayne all the kills. Vayne was 5/0 by 5 minutes. Atleast  13/0 by 10.

Now, that's fine, dying. But on purpose? Olaf continously bought boots and just ran into people whether tower diving at level 3-4 or just running around them. He kept spamming his twitch link in chat and as soon as the game was over Olaf had 4 Lucidity boots and a good 15 deaths or so.

End game lobby he spams his twitch link and his Twitch title is Intentionally Feed if Disrespected.

I was demoted.

What is life.

replies.body:
If it was recorded open a support ticket for play behaviour with a stream link and video proof. 
For extreme cases like this, opening a support ticket literally gets them banned within a few days.

> [{quoted}](name=Paroe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x723NEK9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-16T02:07:03.414+0000)
>
> If it was recorded open a support ticket for play behaviour with a stream link and video proof. 
> For extreme cases like this, opening a support ticket literally gets them banned within a few days.

Even if he didn't record the game, I think the replay system on the new client might be enough to catch for intentional feed. Though the replay wouldn't catch anything said in chat but might be enough.
Did a lil snooping checked your game with him. He did the same on rengar going 2/17 and nothing but boots. Definitely would report for int.

> [{quoted}](name=Spiced Rumm,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x723NEK9,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-03-16T20:15:07.365+0000)
>
> Did a lil snooping checked your game with him. He did the same on rengar going 2/17 and nothing but boots. Definitely would report for int.

I'm definitly going to send in a ticket.
While Olaf certainly fucked over you guys, I don't agree with you sitting in fountain if the rest of your team is still trying to win. Unless they said it was cool, what you did isn't any better.

> [{quoted}](name=TwinkiePro,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x723NEK9,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-03-17T02:41:44.811+0000)
>
> While Olaf certainly fucked over you guys, I don't agree with you sitting in fountain if the rest of your team is still trying to win. Unless they said it was cool, what you did isn't any better.

I sent in a ticket and as soon as I got out of game I got the report message.

What I did isn't any better no, but there was **NO** way of winning it. No matter of smart plays or defensive strategies. We were being 1 vs 5 by the Vayne at 10-15 minutes. So imagine if we have trouble with 1 person imagine if their whole team fought us , Jinx who's underfed and shit in early, Maoki who's just a support, a viktor and a teemo.
Yeah I would report and open a support ticket.  Also for his name.

Lol. send his twitch stream to riot, they will have a field day.

What an imbecile.
